listtools.difference_series¶

abjad.tools.listtools.difference_series(l)¶

Return generator of differences of adjacent elements in l.

>>> l = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 5, 6]
>>> list(listtools.difference_series(l))
[0, 1, 1, 2, 0, 1]
